seg.quote: Visits are permitted only once a month.
Her father would not permit her to eat sweets.
The doctor has permitted him only two meals a day.
Had time permitted, we would have stayed longer.
The timetable permits teams only a few weeks for preparation.

sense.def:
A permit
je uradni dokument, kjer piše, da nekdo sme nekaj narediti.

seg.quote: She could not get in without a permit.
